extendedInfo.description: If you are Foster The People's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Foster The People's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Foster The People's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Foster The People's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Torches-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Broken Jaw- Call It What You Want- Chin Music For The Unsuspecting Hero- Color On The Walls (Don't Stop)- Helena Beat- Houdini- I Would Do Anything For You- Life On The Nickel- Love- Miss You- Pumped Up Kicks- Warrant- Waste
